/* MASTRAM IIITA */
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <deque>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cstring>
#include <climits>

/* looping begin */
#define FOR(i,n) for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
#define ROF(j,n) for(j = n; j >= 0; j--)
#define RFOR(i,a,b,t) for(i = a; i < b; i+=t)
#define IT(x,y) for(it = v.begin(), it != v.end(); it++)

/* stl begin */
#define VI vector <int>
#define VS vector <string>
#define VLL vector <long long>
#define VP vector <pair <int,int> >
//#define MKP(x,y) make_pair(x,y)
#define PI pair <int,int>
#define MP map <int,int>
#define ST set <int>
#define fr first
#define se second
#define pb push_back()
#define ALL(v) v.begin(),v.end()
#define CLEAR(v) v.clear()
#define reset(a,b) memset(a,b,size(a))

/* input output begin */
#define gi(x) scanf("%d", &x)
#define gll(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
#define gllu(x) scanf("%llu", &x)
#define pi(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pll(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pllu(x) printf("%llu\n",x)
#define cn(x) cin >> x
#define co(x) cout << x << endl

/* some basics */
#define M 1000000009
#define MX(a,b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define MN(a,b) ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
#define ll long long
#define llu unsigned long long

/* code begin */

/*void input()
{

}
int main()
{
    int T;
    gi(T);
    while(T--) {
        input()
    }
    return 0;
} */
using namespace std;

vector <pair <int,int> > vp;
#define mp(x,y) make_pair(x,y)
vector <int> v[12];
void input()
{
    int x;
    for(int j = 1; j <= 10; j++) {
        for(int i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
            scanf("%d", &x);
            v[j].push_back(x);
        }

        sort(v[j].begin(),v[j].end());
        int p = v[j][v[j].size()-1] - v[j][0];
        vp.push_back(mp(p,j));
    }
    sort(vp.begin(),vp.end());
    /*for(int l=0; l < vp.size(); l++) {
        cout << " vp-->>f " << vp[l].first << " vp-->>s " << vp[l].second << endl;
    }*/
    int ans1 = vp[0].second;
    int ans2 = vp[0].first;
    for(int k = 1; k < vp.size(); k++) {
        if(vp[k-1].first == vp[k].first ) {
            ans1 =  vp[k].second;
            ans2 = vp[k].first;
        }
        else break;
    }
    printf("%d %d\n",ans1,ans2);
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--) {
        vp.clear();
        for(int i = 0; i < 11; i++) {
            v[i].clear();
        }
        input();
    }
    return 0;
}
